message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. Considering its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than $100. Would you like to discuss a fair price for it?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a price of $110 if you're open to discussing further.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet somewhere in the middle. My counteroffer is $115 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of the item.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I would like to suggest a price of $110 if possible. This still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.
